About
First Flight Island Restaurant & Brewery is located in the heart of downtown Key West, Florida.
Well known for being the birthplace of Pan American World Airways, Pan-Am’s first tickets were sold out of this very building in 1927.
Accessibility
Location + Hours
305-293-8484
301 Whitehead St
Key West, FL 33040
Open Daily
Lunch 11am - 4pm
Dinner 4 - 10pm
Happy Hour 4 - 6pm
(Must be 21 or older in bar area.)

Weddings & Private Events
Realizing your Tropical Dreams . . .
Thank you for considering
Keys Restaurants Group
to host your special event. Keys Restaurants Group includes First Flight Island Restaurant,
Bagatelle
, and
Nine One Five
, offering an array of venue options. The event space that you will need will depend on your guest count and overall vision for the event. Below are a few details on each property!
First Flight Island Restaurant
There are a variety of private event venue options for groups of all sizes at First Flight. Your vision for the event will determine what space is right for you! Learn more about
The Treetop Terrace
and
The Canopy Garden
below.
The Treetop Terrace
Home of the original “Pan Am” headquarters and nestled among the banyan trees, the “Pavilion” and outdoor “Terrace” provide a flexible space for the most fabulous events. All overlooking the garden dining below. This space also features a full bar and private restrooms.
Capacity:
Cocktail Party Up to 80 People | Sit Down Up to 60 People
View More Photos
The Canopy Garden
One of Key West’s largest outdoor garden venues. Plush with tropical foliage and colorful orchids, the garden is best suited for large group gatherings. It features a fold down stage with all power needed for music. The venue also includes access to the Crash Bar and Pub Area.
Capacity:
Cocktail Party Up to 160 People | Sit Down Up to 90-120 People (Depending on Dancing Space)
View More Photos
The Whole House
A full access party to the entire restaurant. Featuring the Treetop Terrace, Canopy Garden and Crash Bar. Two floors with indoor & outdoor space, as well as full bars and restrooms on both floors.
Capacity:
Cocktail Party Up to 350 People | Sit Down Up to 120-175 People (Depending on Dancing Space)
We add 22% gratuity to all special events, as well as, 7.5% Florida State sales tax.
Food & Beverage minimums, as well as site fees may apply for certain rooms.
VIEW CATERING MENUS
BOOK FIRST FLIGHT
VIEW ADDITIONAL FEES
Bagatelle
At Bagatelle, our
Moon Lounge
is a versatile outdoor, open-air space that can accommodate everything from cocktail parties to formal plated dinners. For larger group events we transform the entire top floor of Bagatelle, including our historic balcony overlooking Duval Street, into a custom event space tailored to meet your needs.
In addition to the Moon Lounge, the entire restaurant is available for catering. We can do parties as small as 30 people on the Moon Lounge and up to 250 people with the full restaurant. We can discuss further once you are able to look over the catering package.
LEARN MORE ABOUT MOON LOUNGE
VIEW CATERING MENUS
VIEW ADDITIONAL FEES
VIEW MORE BAGATELLE PHOTOS
We look forward to hearing back from you and hope that you will choose one of our beautiful properties to help make your special occasion as perfect as possible!
View fullsize
View fullsize

Saturday, October 25
2025 Fantasy Fest Parade Viewing Party @ First Flight
By
FIRST FLIGHT ISLAND RESTAURANT AND BREWERY
Come join us at First Flight for the 2025 Fantasy Fest Parade Viewing Party, where we'll have the best seats in town to enjoy the colorful p
Date and time
Saturday, October 25 · 6 - 9:30pm EDT
Location
First Flight Island Restaurant & Brewery
301 Whitehead Street Key West, FL 33040 United States
Get directions
Good to know
Highlights
3 hours, 30 minutes
In person
Refund Policy
Refunds up to 7 days before event
About this event
Community • City & Town
2025 Fantasy Fest Parade Viewing Party @ First Flight
Come join us at
First Flight
for a fantastic view of the
Fantasy Fest Parade
! Grab some friends and enjoy the vibrant floats, dazzling performers, and lively music right from the heart of the action.
Immerse yourself in the festive atmosphere as you watch the parade pass by in all its glory. Don't miss this chance to be part of one of the most exciting events of the year!
